metaDescription: Find top-rated financial advisors in Lehi. Expert guidance for retirement planning, wealth management, and investment strategies.

advisors.name: R.O.I. Wealth Management - Fee Only Financial Advisors

heroDescription: Lehi, Utah, is a rapidly growing city known for its vibrant tech sector and family-friendly environment.
landscapeDescription: Lehi's economy is driven by technology and manufacturing, with a strong presence of startups and established firms. The city benefits from its proximity to the Silicon Slopes, fostering innovation and job growth.
uniqueNeeds: Lehi's growth demands infrastructure improvements and affordable housing solutions to accommodate its expanding population.
citySpecificRiskAdvice: Lehi's tech concentration poses risks of economic downturns; housing prices may bubble. Prepare for natural disasters like flooding and diversify investments across sectors.

sections.title: Economic Growth
sections.description: According to BEA (2023), Lehi's economy grew by 5.2% in the past year, driven by tech and retail sectors.

sections.title: Wealth Demographics
sections.description: According to Census (2023), the median income in Lehi is $85,000, reflecting its affluent population.

sections.title: Advisor Specializations
sections.description: Based on BLS (2023), financial advisors in Lehi are increasingly focusing on tech and startup funding.

sections.title: Cost of Living
sections.description: According to BLS (2024), Lehi's cost of living is rising, with housing costs significantly impacting affordability.

sections.title: Real Estate Market
sections.description: According to Zillow (2024), Lehi's real estate market shows a 10% increase in home prices year-over-year, indicating strong demand.

sections.title: Business Environment
sections.description: According to Fortune (2024), Lehi's business climate is favorable, attracting new startups and established companies alike.
